direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle OCO orders but perform different operations (retrieval vs. cancellation).
Both methods retrieve OCO orders with similar control flows and parameter handling.
Both methods access and retrieve OCO order-related data.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the initialization of the RequestHandler for API requests.

enhanced_by.method_name: sendSignedRequest(String, String, Map<String, Object>, HttpMethod, boolean)
enhanced_by.reason: The sendSignedRequest method is invoked to perform the actual API request in both methods.
Both methods need to verify the response format and handle potential exceptions similarly.
